name: StarTech ST1000BT32 Gigabit Ethernet PCI Network Adapter
Features: [IEEE 802.1Q VLAN tagging for up to 64 VLANs, IEEE 802.3x compliant flow control for full duplex and backpressure for half duplex, LED indicator shows network link/activity and 10/100/1000Mbits/sec selection, One RJ-45 connector supports 10/100/1000Mbits/sec network speeds and Auto-MDI/MDI-X, Supports 32-bit 33/66MHz PCI Local Bus Master for high-speed operation]
